name: Standard Prop
description: While some drones like the DJI Phantom look more or less the same from any angle, there is a front and back

Name: Pusher Prop
description: The Pusher props are at the back and push theUAV forward hence the name “Pusher props”.

Name: Brushless Motors
description: Motor design is important. More efficient motors save battery life and give the owner more flying time which is what every pilot wants

Name: Motor Mount
description: The drone motor mount is made of aluminum alloy, which is durable and can love you to goose lake for a long time.

Name: Landing Gear
description: Drones which need high ground clearance may adopt helicopter-style skids mounted directly to the body, while other drones which have no hanging payload may omit landing gear altogether

Name: Boom
description: Shorter booms increase maneuverability, while longer booms increase stability

Name: Drone Frame
description: The sturdy material has good impact resistance and can withstand the impact of a hard landing

Name: Electronic Speed Controllers
description: Made of high quality aluminum alloy heat dissipation, waterproof and dustproof, long service life.

Name: Flight Controller
description: Has small size and light weight, close fitting, simple for installation and removal, will not take much effort or time, improving your using experience

Name: GPS Module
description: BN-880 Flight Control GPS Module Dual Module Compass with Cable for RC Drone FPV Racing.

Name: Drone Receiver
description: It is suitable for the installation of miniature brushless and hollow cup indoor quadcopter. Bring a great gaming experience.

Name: Drone Antenna
description: Depending on your receiver, it may be a loose wire whip or helical “rubber ducky” type.

Name: Drone Monitor
description: Record FPV footage with the integrated built in DVR,In outdoor flight, your drone is flying fast as a bird in the sky. You need keep an eye on it to assure its safely.

Name: Drone O.Gimbal
description: The intelligent flight modes enable the drone to fly automatically, such as GPS follow me, Waypoint flight, Point of Interest flight, Trajectory Flight, allow you to enjoy the creative fun of free flight.
